alert.note: Alert for Barranquitas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 28 at 7:09PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Barranquitas, Corozal, Morovis and Orocovis. * WHEN...Until 800 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 605 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 4 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. Band of rains will continue to affect these areas, especially the municipality of Morovis. Communities along these rivers or small streams should be attentive to any impacts.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
